Name: Spaghetti Carbonara
Ingredients: Spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, pancetta, garlic, salt, pepper
Steps: Boil spaghetti until al dente. In a separate pan, cook pancetta until crispy. In a bowl, whisk eggs and parmesan. Drain pasta, saving some water. Quickly mix pasta with egg mixture and pancetta, adding reserved water if needed to make it creamy. Season with salt and pepper.

Name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
Ingredients: Bread, butter, cheddar cheese
Steps: Butter one side of each bread slice. Place cheese between the unbuttered sides. Heat a pan on medium and cook sandwich on both sides until golden brown and cheese is melted.

Name: Beef Wellington
Ingredients: Beef tenderloin, puff pastry, mushrooms, prosciutto, egg yolk, salt, pepper, mustard
Steps: Season and sear the beef. Finely chop and cook mushrooms to remove moisture. Wrap beef in prosciutto and mushroom mixture. Encase in puff pastry, brush with egg yolk, and bake until golden and internal temperature is reached. Let rest before slicing.

Name: Chicken Stir Fry
Ingredients: Chicken breast, soy sauce, garlic, ginger, bell peppers, broccoli, olive oil, salt, pepper
Steps: Slice chicken and vegetables. Heat oil in a pan and cook garlic and ginger. Add chicken and stir until cooked through. Toss in vegetables and stir-fry until tender. Add soy sauce, season with salt and pepper, and mix well.

Name: Vegetable Curry
Ingredients: Potatoes, carrots, onions, curry powder, coconut milk, garlic, salt, pepper, olive oil
Steps: Chop vegetables evenly. Sauté onions and garlic in olive oil, then add curry powder. Add vegetables and coconut milk, and simmer until vegetables are soft. Season with salt and pepper.

Name: Pancakes
Ingredients: Flour, milk, eggs, baking powder, sugar, salt, butter
Steps: Mix flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt. Whisk in milk and eggs until smooth. Heat a buttered pan and pour batter to form pancakes. Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden. Serve warm with syrup.

Name: Omelette
Ingredients: Eggs, milk, salt, pepper, butter, cheese, vegetables
Steps: Beat eggs with milk, salt, and pepper. Melt butter in a pan over medium heat and pour in the egg mixture. Add cheese and chopped vegetables. Cook until set and fold the omelette in half. Serve immediately.

Name: Caesar Salad
Ingredients: Romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, Caesar dressing, anchovies
Steps: Chop romaine lettuce and toss with Caesar dressing. Add croutons and sprinkle with parmesan cheese and anchovies. Serve chilled.

Name: Tomato Soup
Ingredients: Tomatoes, onion, garlic, vegetable broth, basil, salt, pepper, olive oil
Steps: Sauté chopped onion and garlic in olive oil until translucent. Add tomatoes and vegetable broth and simmer until tomatoes break down. Blend until smooth, then season with basil, salt, and pepper.

Name: Fish Tacos
Ingredients: Fish fillets, taco shells, cabbage slaw, lime, sour cream, chili powder, salt, pepper
Steps: Season fish fillets with chili powder, salt, and pepper, then cook until flaky. Assemble tacos by placing fish in taco shells, topping with cabbage slaw, a squeeze of lime, and a drizzle of sour cream.

Name: Mushroom Risotto
Ingredients: Arborio rice, mushrooms, onion, garlic, white wine, vegetable broth, parmesan cheese, butter, salt, pepper
Steps: Sauté chopped onion, garlic, and mushrooms in butter until softened. Add Arborio rice and toast lightly. Pour in white wine until absorbed, then gradually add heated broth while stirring continuously. Finish by stirring in parmesan cheese and seasoning with salt and pepper.

Name: Baked Ziti
Ingredients: Ziti pasta, tomato sauce, ricotta cheese, mozzarella, parmesan, ground beef, garlic, basil, salt, pepper
Steps: Cook ziti pasta until al dente. Brown ground beef with garlic, then mix with tomato sauce. Combine pasta with meat sauce and cheeses. Transfer to a baking dish, top with extra mozzarella, and bake until bubbly and golden. Garnish with basil.

Name: Lamb Curry
Ingredients: Lamb, onions, garlic, ginger, tomatoes, curry powder, coconut milk, cumin, coriander, salt, pepper
Steps: Brown lamb pieces in a heavy pan. Remove and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger until soft. Stir in curry powder, cumin, coriander, and tomatoes. Return lamb to the pan, pour in coconut milk, and simmer until the lamb is tender. Adjust seasoning to taste.

Name: Shrimp Scampi
Ingredients: Shrimp, garlic, butter, olive oil, lemon, white wine, parsley, salt, pepper, spaghetti
Steps: Heat olive oil and butter in a pan, then add garlic until fragrant. Cook shrimp until pink, then add lemon juice and a splash of white wine. Toss with cooked spaghetti and garnish with chopped parsley. Season with salt and pepper.

Name: Quiche Lorraine
Ingredients: Pie crust, eggs, heavy cream, bacon, swiss cheese, onion, salt, pepper, nutmeg
Steps: Prebake the pie crust until lightly golden. Sauté bacon and onions until crisp. Whisk together eggs, heavy cream, salt, pepper, and a pinch of nutmeg. Spread bacon, onions, and swiss cheese in the crust, pour the egg mixture over, and bake until the quiche is set.

Name: Ratatouille
Ingredients: Eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, tomatoes, onion, garlic, olive oil, basil, salt, pepper
Steps: Cut all vegetables into uniform pieces. Sauté onions and garlic in olive oil until soft. Add eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, and tomatoes, and simmer until all vegetables are tender. Season with basil, salt, and pepper.

Name: Tiramisu
Ingredients: Ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, eggs, sugar, espresso, cocoa powder, rum, salt
Steps: Separate egg yolks and whites. Whisk yolks with sugar, then mix in mascarpone. Beat egg whites until stiff and fold into the mixture. Dip ladyfingers briefly in espresso mixed with rum, layer them with the mascarpone cream, dust with cocoa powder, and refrigerate to set.

Name: French Toast
Ingredients: Bread, eggs, milk, cinnamon, vanilla extract, butter, maple syrup
Steps: Whisk together eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla. Dip bread slices into the mixture. Fry in a buttered pan until golden on both sides. Serve with a drizzle of maple syrup.

Name: Chicken Alfredo
Ingredients: Fettuccine, chicken breast, heavy cream, parmesan cheese, garlic, butter, salt, pepper
Steps: Cook fettuccine until al dente. Sauté chicken pieces in butter with garlic until fully cooked. Pour in heavy cream and simmer, then stir in parmesan until melted. Toss the pasta in the sauce and season with salt and pepper.

Name: Beef Stroganoff
Ingredients: Beef strips, mushrooms, onions, sour cream, beef broth, mustard, butter, salt, pepper, egg noodles
Steps: Sear beef strips and set aside. In the same pan, sauté onions and mushrooms in butter. Return beef to the pan, add beef broth and a spoonful of mustard, and simmer briefly. Stir in sour cream, then serve over cooked egg noodles.

Name: Egg Fried Rice
Ingredients: Rice, eggs, peas, carrots, soy sauce, green onions, oil, salt, pepper
Steps: Scramble eggs in a hot pan with oil and set aside. Stir-fry diced carrots and peas, then add cooked rice and soy sauce. Mix in the scrambled eggs and chopped green onions, and season with salt and pepper.

Name: Chili Con Carne
Ingredients: Ground beef, kidney beans, tomatoes, onion, garlic, chili powder, cumin, salt, pepper, olive oil
Steps: Brown ground beef with chopped onion and garlic in olive oil. Stir in tomatoes, kidney beans, chili powder, and cumin. Simmer until flavors meld together, and season with salt and pepper.

Name: Falafel Wrap
Ingredients: Chickpeas, garlic, onion, parsley, cumin, coriander, flour, salt, pepper, pita bread, tahini sauce
Steps: Blend chickpeas with garlic, onion, parsley, cumin, and coriander until coarse. Mix in flour, salt, and pepper, form patties and fry until golden. Stuff pita bread with falafel and drizzle with tahini sauce.

Name: Sushi Rolls
Ingredients: Sushi rice, nori, fish or vegetables, rice vinegar, sugar, salt, soy sauce, wasabi
Steps: Prepare sushi rice by mixing with a vinegar, sugar, and salt solution. Lay a thin layer of rice on nori, add your chosen fillings, and roll tightly. Slice the roll and serve with soy sauce and a dab of wasabi.

Name: Pad Thai
Ingredients: Rice noodles, shrimp or chicken, eggs, bean sprouts, peanuts, tamarind paste, fish sauce, garlic, lime, oil
Steps: Soak rice noodles until soft. Stir-fry your protein with garlic, then add beaten eggs and scramble. Mix in noodles, tamarind paste, and fish sauce. Toss in bean sprouts, garnish with peanuts and a squeeze of lime.

Name: Gazpacho
Ingredients: Tomatoes, cucumber, red bell pepper, red onion, garlic, olive oil, red wine vinegar, salt, pepper
Steps: Blend tomatoes, cucumber, bell pepper, red onion, and garlic with olive oil until smooth. Chill in the refrigerator for several hours. Stir in red wine vinegar and season with salt and pepper before serving.

Name: Chicken Pot Pie
Ingredients: Chicken, carrots, peas, potatoes, onions, chicken broth, flour, butter, pie crust, salt, pepper, thyme
Steps: Cook diced chicken with carrots, peas, potatoes, and onions until tender. Thicken chicken broth with a flour and butter roux. Fill a pie crust with the mixture, cover with another crust, seal the edges, and bake until golden.

Name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients: Bell peppers, ground beef, rice, tomatoes, onion, garlic, cheese, salt, pepper, olive oil
Steps: Halve and deseed bell peppers. Brown ground beef with onion and garlic, then mix with cooked rice and tomatoes. Stuff the peppers with the mixture, top with cheese, and bake until peppers are tender.

Name: Pesto Pasta
Ingredients: Pasta, basil, pine nuts, garlic, parmesan cheese, olive oil, salt, pepper
Steps: Cook pasta until al dente. In a blender, combine basil, pine nuts, garlic, parmesan, olive oil, salt, and pepper to create pesto. Toss the pasta with the pesto sauce and serve.

Name: Baked Salmon
Ingredients: Salmon fillets, lemon, dill, olive oil, salt, pepper
Steps: Place salmon fillets on a baking tray. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice, sprinkle with dill, salt, and pepper. Bake until the salmon flakes easily when tested with a fork.

Name: Meatloaf
Ingredients: Ground beef, breadcrumbs, eggs, onion, garlic, ketchup, Worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper
Steps: Mix ground beef with breadcrumbs, beaten eggs, chopped onion, garlic, ketchup, and Worcestershire sauce. Shape into a loaf, place in a baking dish, and bake until cooked through. Let rest before slicing.

Name: Enchiladas
Ingredients: Tortillas, shredded chicken, enchilada sauce, cheese, onions, bell peppers, garlic, salt, pepper
Steps: Fill tortillas with shredded chicken, sautéed onions, and bell peppers. Roll up and place in a baking dish. Cover with enchilada sauce and cheese, then bake until the cheese is melted and bubbly.

Name: Gnocchi with Tomato Sauce
Ingredients: Potato gnocchi, tomatoes, garlic, olive oil, basil, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese
Steps: Boil gnocchi until they float to the surface. Meanwhile, sauté garlic in olive oil, add chopped tomatoes and basil to simmer into a sauce. Toss the gnocchi with the sauce and top with grated parmesan.

Name: Burrito Bowl
Ingredients: Rice, black beans, corn, chicken or beef, salsa, avocado, lettuce, cheese, lime, salt, pepper
Steps: Prepare rice and season black beans. Grill your choice of meat and chop vegetables. Assemble a bowl with rice, meat, beans, corn, salsa, avocado, and cheese. Top with a squeeze of lime and serve.

Name: Paella
Ingredients: Rice, chicken, shrimp, mussels, chorizo, bell peppers, tomatoes, saffron, peas, onion, garlic, chicken broth, olive oil, salt, pepper
Steps: Sauté chicken and chorizo in olive oil until browned. Add onion, garlic, and bell peppers, then stir in rice and saffron. Pour in chicken broth, arrange seafood on top, and simmer until the rice is cooked. Stir in peas and serve.

Name: Ramen
Ingredients: Ramen noodles, pork or chicken broth, soy sauce, miso paste, garlic, ginger, soft boiled eggs, green onions, mushrooms, seaweed, salt
Steps: Prepare a rich broth with soy sauce, miso paste, garlic, and ginger. Cook ramen noodles separately and add to the broth along with mushrooms and seaweed. Top with soft boiled eggs and green onions before serving.

Name: Clam Chowder
Ingredients: Clams, potatoes, onion, celery, bacon, cream, chicken broth, butter, salt, pepper, thyme
Steps: Cook bacon until crispy and remove from the pan. Sauté diced onion, celery, and potatoes in the bacon fat. Add chicken broth and clams, simmer until potatoes are tender. Stir in cream, season with salt, pepper, and thyme, then top with crumbled bacon.

Name: BLT Sandwich
Ingredients: Bread, bacon, lettuce, tomato, mayonnaise, salt, pepper
Steps: Cook bacon until crisp. Toast the bread slices and spread mayonnaise on one side. Layer lettuce, tomato slices, and bacon between the bread. Season with salt and pepper, then serve.

Name: Mac and Cheese
Ingredients: Pasta, cheddar cheese, milk, butter, flour, salt, pepper, breadcrumbs
Steps: Cook pasta until al dente. Create a roux with butter and flour, then whisk in milk. Melt in cheddar cheese to form a sauce, and mix with the pasta. Top with breadcrumbs and bake until golden and bubbly.

Name: Shepherd's Pie
Ingredients: Ground lamb or beef, carrots, peas, onion, garlic, tomato paste, Worcestershire sauce, mashed potatoes, salt, pepper
Steps: Sauté ground meat with diced onion, garlic, carrots, and peas. Stir in tomato paste and Worcestershire sauce. Transfer to a baking dish, top with a layer of mashed potatoes, and bake until the top is lightly browned.

Name: Fajitas
Ingredients: Chicken or beef, bell peppers, onions, lime, fajita seasoning, tortillas, oil, salt, pepper
Steps: Slice the meat and vegetables into strips. Sauté in oil with fajita seasoning until cooked through. Serve hot in warmed tortillas with a squeeze of lime.

Name: Eggplant Parmesan
Ingredients: Eggplant, tomato sauce, mozzarella, parmesan, breadcrumbs, eggs, basil, olive oil, salt, pepper
Steps: Slice eggplant and dip in beaten eggs, then coat with breadcrumbs. Fry until golden. Layer fried eggplant in a dish with tomato sauce and cheeses, then bake until the cheese melts and the dish is bubbly. Garnish with fresh basil.

Name: Prawn Curry
Ingredients: Prawns, coconut milk, curry paste, garlic, ginger, onion, tomatoes, cilantro, salt, pepper, oil
Steps: Sauté chopped onion, garlic, and ginger in oil until fragrant. Stir in curry paste and diced tomatoes, then add prawns and coconut milk. Simmer until prawns are cooked through and garnish with chopped cilantro.

Name: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients: Flour, cocoa powder, sugar, eggs, butter, baking powder, milk, vanilla extract, salt, chocolate frosting
Steps: Mix together dry ingredients. Beat eggs and butter, then combine with milk and vanilla extract. Gradually mix in the dry ingredients until smooth. Pour into a greased pan and bake until a toothpick comes out clean. Let cool and frost with chocolate frosting.

Name: Banana Bread
Ingredients: Bananas, flour, sugar, eggs, butter, baking soda, vanilla extract, salt
Steps: Mash ripe bananas and mix with melted butter. Stir in sugar, beaten eggs, and vanilla extract. Fold in flour, baking soda, and salt until just combined. Pour into a loaf pan and bake until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.

Name: Lasagna
Ingredients: Lasagna noodles, ground beef, ricotta cheese, mozzarella, parmesan, tomato sauce, garlic, onion, basil, salt, pepper
Steps: Cook lasagna noodles and brown ground beef with garlic and onion. Layer noodles with meat sauce, ricotta, mozzarella, and parmesan in a baking dish. Repeat layers and finish with a top layer of cheese. Bake until bubbly and golden on top.

Name: Chicken Noodle Soup
Ingredients: Chicken, egg noodles, carrots, celery, onion, garlic, chicken broth, salt, pepper, thyme
Steps: Simmer chicken with chopped vegetables and chicken broth until tender. Remove chicken to shred, then return it to the pot along with egg noodles. Cook until noodles are tender, and season with salt, pepper, and thyme.

Name: Waffles
Ingredients: Flour, eggs, milk, baking powder, sugar, salt, melted butter, vanilla extract
Steps: Mix dry ingredients in one bowl and wet ingredients in another. Combine both mixtures until smooth. Pour batter into a preheated waffle iron and cook until waffles are golden and crisp.

Name: Caprese Salad
Ingredients: Tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, basil, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, pepper
Steps: Slice tomatoes and fresh mozzarella. Arrange on a plate alternating with basil leaves. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar, and season with salt and pepper before serving.

Name: Jelly Filled Donut
Ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 tbsp sugar, 1 packet active dry yeast, 1/2 cup warm milk, 1/4 cup melted butter, 1/4 tsp salt, 1 large egg, 1 cup jelly or jam (your choice), vegetable oil for frying, powdered sugar for dusting
Steps: 1. In a small bowl, combine warm milk, sugar, and yeast. Let it sit for 5-10 minutes until frothy. 2. In a larger bowl, mix flour, salt, and melted butter. Add the yeast mixture and the egg, and stir to form a dough. 3. Knead the dough on a floured surface for about 5-7 minutes, then place it in a greased bowl. Cover and let it rise for 1-2 hours until doubled in size. 4. Punch down the dough, then roll it out to about 1/2-inch thickness. Cut circles using a cookie cutter or glass. 5. Heat oil in a deep fryer or large pot to 350°F (175°C). Fry the donuts in batches, about 2-3 minutes per side, until golden brown. 6. Let the donuts cool on a paper towel-lined plate. 7. Once cooled, use a piping bag or a small knife to fill each donut with jelly or jam. 8. Dust with powdered sugar before serving.
